svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2020-03-31T13:32:52.168Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/80.0.3987.149 Safari/537.36" etag="K41INi1VVLC2U-U3UwM8" version="12.8.5" type="google"><diagram name="Page-1" id="c7558073-3199-34d8-9f00-42111426c3f3"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 922px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 9px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Delivery takes time, so the first thing to order on Aliexpress or buy in the radio parts store: a Wemos D1 mini board, BME 280 sensor, a 18650 battery + holder,
a solar panel (or two for successive switching on if there are many cloudy days), resistance 125, 10, 10, 10 kOhm, field effect transistors P0603BDG (can be
removed from the motherboard), diode, wiring. You can also purchase soldering kits or soldering stations, additional sensors or kits for beginners.

switch.text: Delivery takes time, so the first thing to order on Aliexpress or buy in the radio parts store: a Wemos D1 mini board, BME 280 sensor, a 18650 battery + h...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Register on GitHub. On GitHub we will save our Backend application. https://github.com/join

switch.text: Register on GitHub. On GitHub we will save our...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 215px; margin-left: 661px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Register for Mongo DB. Here will be located the Database for our Backend application. https://www.mongodb.com/cloud/atlas/register

switch.text: Register for Mongo DB. Here will be located th...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 661px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Fork into your github https://github.com/alexanderkif/meteo (Fork button) and clone it to your computer (git clone https://github.com/yourRepository/meteo.git ).

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 331px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Install Git. Git is needed to work with GitHub. https://git-scm.com/downloads

switch.text: Install Git. Git is needed to work with GitHub...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 215px; margin-left: 331px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Register at Zeit.co (Now) "Continue with GitHub". Our Backend app from GitHub will automatically launch there. https://zeit.co/signup

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 215px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Create a new project on Zeit.co. Bind it to your meteo repository on GitHub (GIT INTEGRATION). Add database uri to environment variables.

switch.text: Create a new project on Zeit.co. Bind it to yo...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 480px; margin-left: 1px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: In VSCode, open the meteo folder and in the terminal (ctrl + ~) run npm install.

div.div:
Correct with your data
mySSID = "mySSID", myPass = "myPass",
myUrl = "https://myproject.myaccount.now.sh/data"myKey = "mySuperKey"

div.div: Since there are changes (file MeteoBasicHttpsClient.ino), you can commit and push a local meteo on GitHub. The deployment to zeit.co will automatically happen

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
